title: Themed Skins and fine lines
body:
I remember making a post about making a "spiderman-themed" skin line for the champs who pull people or can "web-zip" to walls/champs, and someone said something about copyrights... lol I feel that statement has no grounds because I'm obviously not saying put "Spiderman [champion}" on the skin theme. 

This Odyssey theme clearly is referenced by Guardians of the Galaxy with a taste of Borderlands, and such as things similar.

not to mention, 2 skins shen have that clearly represent Subzero and Scorpion from mortal kombat
and the existence of Kha-ziks and Rengar a reference to Alien vs Predator.... like come on lol where's the skin lines for those too. 

Riot dropped an cool event/skins for Riven and Yasuo, and another impressive Darius/Garen event... so i know they can do a Kha'ziks and Rengar event..

Just saying... I understand Riot needs to make money too, but does it not make sense to give some skins to other champs, especially these new champs.
Because these new champs are technically getting played often enough to have people want to see them in skins.  

Also, quite honestly I've heard from many players that they would play champs more if they had cooler/newer skins.

Not saying the skins coming out are not cool, just saying the SAME champs are getting the cool skins. Even Taliyah makes splashes in high elo and professional scenes, but she only has SSG skin and the default released 2nd skin.

Overall, Riot, please don't be afraid to create some skins on these other champs with less/older skins. People WILL drop that money for these skins as long as you put them out there lol it's all aesthetics, after all.
